Class StateUpdate

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • usernode.StateUpdate
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class StateUpdate
extends java.lang.Thread
    This class takes care of updating the information regarding the nodes that are considered alive.
